about_the_game:
Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place Soundtrack.

Get spooked by these music tracks composed by Octavi Navarro himself.
It includes 17 music pieces in MP3.
Tracks will be downloaded to your game's Steam folder.

Every purchase of the Soundtrack DLC will help us create future games. Thank you!
